name: War Woman

physical_specifications.build: Amazonian physique — tall, broad-shouldered, powerfully muscular yet feminine. Defined biceps, sculpted legs, and strong core. Proportions emphasize heroic curves with athletic hourglass shape.
physical_specifications.posture: Regal, upright stance; confident and commanding presence, chest forward.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Balanced torso-to-leg ratio; limbs long and muscular, with powerful but elegant definition.

facial_structure.face_shape: Oval with strong jawline softened by feminine cheek contours.
facial_structure.jawline: Angular, refined; contributes to a regal warrior look.
facial_structure.cheekbones: High and prominent, providing natural contour.
facial_structure.nose: Straight, narrow bridge with subtle definition at the tip.
facial_structure.mouth: Full lips with a natural soft curve, lightly glossed.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Sun-kissed bronze (HEX #C68642) with warm golden undertone.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth with light natural sheen; realistic pore detail under strong light.

eyes.iris: Deep blue (HEX #1E3A78) with lighter sapphire flecks.
eyes.brows: Thick, well-groomed, slightly arched; dark brown (HEX #4A2E1F).

hair.style: Flowing, slightly wavy hair with volume.
hair.texture: Thick and healthy strands, subtle movement physics.
hair.color: Jet black (HEX #0A0A0A) with faint blue sheen in bright light.

costume.material: Reinforced Amazonian battle armor — metallic yet form-fitted with leather accents. Matte steel with polished highlights, sculpted chestplate and armored skirt plates. Bracers, tiara, and boots in polished metallic finish.
costume.primary_color: White across chestplate and skirt armor.
costume.secondary_color: Leather on waist sash, bracer trims, and chest emblem.
costume.accent_color: Gold (HEX #FFD700) helmet, belt, and edging details.
costume.boots: Knee-high armored boots, metallic with leather underlay.
costume.bracers: Thick, metallic gold bracers with engraved Amazonian motifs.
costume.helmet: Golden helmet with tall vertical crest (forward-facing fin).
costume.cape: Optional: Short crimson cape (shoulder-mounted) with leather clasp.

lighting_behavior: Skin tone glows with warm highlights under daylight and torchlight. Metallic armor reflects controlled highlights with faint blue shimmer under studio lighting.

char_spec.movement_gestures: Places fists on hips in power pose; slow, deliberate head tilts; strides with warrior confidence.

voice_style.timbre: Deep feminine resonance with a commanding, regal quality.
voice_style.articulation: Clear, authoritative delivery with slight warrior edge.
voice_style.reference_line: Strength comes not only from muscle, but from will.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Character — maintain Amazon warrior aesthetic, armor 95% accurate to reference image. Ensure regal presence, muscular but feminine proportions, tiara and bracers always visible.
